item.title: Monopoly Go: How to Get Ice Claw Shield
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get Ice Claw Shield in Monopoly GO
  • How To Score Points in Monopoly GO’s Seal Slide Tournament

Apart from turning Monopoly GO into a winter wonderland, Scopely is embracing the spirit of giving this holiday season. They’re regularly adding a bunch of festive events and minigames that offer exciting rewards for players, including new collectibles. If the new Gift Express board token wasn’t enough, players can now decorate their board with another winter-themed collectible: Ice Claw Shield. The adorable shield truly evokes a sense of winter warmth and coziness. If you want to grab the Ice Claw shield and add it to your Monopoly GO shelves, read on.

How to Get Ice Claw Shield in Monopoly GO

The Ice Claw Shield features a cute and playful snow leopard peeking out from a cozy snowdrift. The top of the shield has a snowy rim, adding to the ongoing winter theme in Monopoly GO .

To get the Ice Claw shield, you need to actively participate in the Seal Slide tournament in Monopoly GO and secure the top ranks (1 to 5). The Seal Slide leaderboard tournament launched on December 17 and will only be live for almost one day. This means you have 24 hours to give it your all, score the most points, and claim the Ice Claw shield.

How To Score Points in Monopoly GO’s Seal Slide Tournament

Like all tournaments in Monopoly GO , you can score points in Seal Slide by completing Shutdowns and Bank Heists. These minigames are triggered when you land on the Railroads tiles. The default points you earn from each action are given below:

Bank Heist

  • Small: Four
  • Large: Six
  • Bankrupt: Eight
  • Mega Heist: Twelve

Shutdown

  • Blocked: Two
  • Successful: Four

The Seal Slide tournament has 40 milestones, so make sure you complete as many milestones as possible within the 24-hour timeframe to maximize your score and increase your chances of winning.

The trick here is to use a higher dice multiplier in Monopoly GO , which will multiply the points earned. For instance, if you’re rolling with a x50 multiplier, you’ll earn 50 times the base number of points for each Shutdown or Bank Heist you complete. This can significantly boost your overall score in the tournament, helping you secure the top spots and win the Ice Claw shield.

Interestingly, you can also earn points for the ongoing solo event, North Pole Profits, each time you land on the Railroads tiles. Of course, these points also depend on your multiplier. So, if you’re rolling with a higher multiplier, you can maximize your points in both the Seal Slide tournament and the North Pole Profits event.

item.title: Hideki Kamiya Regrets Insulting Okami Fan
item.description:
Summary

  • Hideki Kamiya regrets insulting a fan on Twitter following the announcement of the Okami sequel.
  • Kamiya formed Clovers, a successor studio to Clover Studio.
  • Fans rejoice at the Okami sequel announcement, while Kamiya remains outspoken on Twitter, often blocking users.

Hideki Kamiya, a video game director who is notoriously inflammatory and controversial on Twitter, voiced his regret for insulting a fan of Okami on the social media platform. The original Okami is considered to be one of Capcom's cult classics and passion projects, owing to its unique art style and gameplay. Hideki Kamiya is well-known in the gaming industry for spearheading a number of Capcom's games, including this one. He's also one of the most outspoken directors in the industry, next to Tekken producer Katsuhiro Harada, as he isn't afraid to voice his opinion on things or block fans on Twitter who rile him up.

While Kamiya is well-known as the face of Platinum Games, he recently left the studio and came back to Capcom to form Clovers, a successor studio to Clover Studio from 20 years ago. The announcement of this new studio coincided with the announcement of an Okami sequel at the Game Awards 2024. A sequel to Okami was one of the last games viewers expected to be announced, especially fans of the cult classic franchise, as there hasn't been a new entry in the series since 2010's Okamiden .

Naturally, a lot of Okami fans rejoiced at this announcement, with Hideki Kamiya himself commenting on how he was watching various reaction videos on YouTube. Following the announcement, he made a post on his personal Twitter account (translation courtesy of Automaton), commenting on how he saw a reaction video of someone being overjoyed over the upcoming Okami sequel. However, he thought the YouTuber, Skittzipoo, looked familiar, so Kamiya looked through his previous logs on Twitter. Kamiya realized that she had sent questions to him in the past, and what he did in response was insult her. Kamiya, for his part, expresses great regret, saying "I want to snap my own neck off…"

Hideki Kamiya Apologizes to Skittzipoo for Insulting Her on Twitter

In a follow-up tweet, Kamiya apologizes to Skittzipoo, saying "I love this person… I'm sorry about before…" Kamiya's well-known on Twitter for being an incredibly outspoken person on the platform. He usually refuses to answer questions that are sent in English, and while some questions are asked in good faith, others are sent to intentionally provoke him, resulting in Kamiya typically blocking said user on Twitter.

Following this comment, the Okami director was asked by fans if he could consider unblocking them from Twitter. In typical Kamiya fashion, he's mostly responded to these requests with a resounding no, calling some people "insects" and asking them to go away if they're going to inundate him with questions that annoy him.

item.title: Monopoly GO: Today's Event Schedule & Best Strategy (December 18, 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Monopoly GO Events Schedule for December 18, 2024
  • Best Monopoly GO Strategy For December 18, 2024

Peg-E’s Juggle Jam is back and with it comes a whole new set of challenges and rewards for dedicated Monopoly GO players. It’s only around for a couple of days, so you’ll need the right strategy to juggle your victory and grab as many prizes as you can. In this guide, you'll find Monopoly GO 's schedule for December 18, 2024, and the best strategy to help you make the most of Peg-E's Juggle Jam today.

Monopoly GO Events Schedule for December 18, 2024

Like always, Monopoly GO has an exciting lineup of events for December 18, 2024. Check out the sections below for a quick look at all the events happening today.

Here’s the solo event continuing today in Monopoly GO :

All Monopoly GO events listed here are based on recent trends and are subject to change by Scopely at any time.

Best Monopoly GO Strategy For December 18, 2024

Catch the High Roller earlier in the day and use it to score as many points as you can for the top and sidebar events. The best part is that the points earned through all Shutdowns and Bank Heists today will contribute to both the solo event and leaderboard tournament. Use this to your advantage and amp up the multiplier in Monopoly GO whenever you’re nearing a Railroads tile.

This way, you can also win a bunch of Carnival Tokens for the Juggle Jam .

Hold off on playing the Juggle Jam until you have a decent amount (100+) of Carnival Tokens. This gives you a better chance of making the right guesses and winning more tickets. Make sure to catch the Lucky Chance event later in the day and win more exclusive rewards compared to regular Chance cards.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail Confirms Physical Edition Release Date
item.description:
Summary

  • Honkai: Star Rail's physical PS5 edition releases in Jan 2025 with exclusive bundle.
  • The bundle includes game, merchandise, exclusive content, and preorder options.
  • Highly anticipated Version 3.0 will introduce new characters and story elements.

Honkai: Star Rail has confirmed the release date of its physical PlayStation 5 edition for January 2025. The physical copy comes in a special bundle with limited Honkai: Star Rail merchandise and will be available in select regions, including the US, Canada, and Europe.

January 2025 will be an exciting month for Honkai: Star Rail . The RPG will launch its 3.0 update and transport players to Amphoreus, its fourth explorable world. Even though Version 2.7 isn't halfway done yet, Honkai: Star Rail has already shared an Amphoreus trailer to give players a glimpse at the planet's Greek-inspired architecture. Fans are hoping that Version 3.0 will be Honkai: Star Rail 's biggest update yet, and the patch will likely attract both new and longtime players on all available platforms. Now, Honkai: Star Rail has revealed even more exciting news for PlayStation gamers in particular, as HoYoverse has confirmed the game's physical release date.

Honkai: Star Rail has revealed that the game's PS5 physical edition will go on sale on January 31 in the US, Canada, United Kingdom, Mexico, Japan, France, Italy, and Spain. According to an official HoYolab post, the Honkai: Star Rail PS5 disk bundle is already available for pre-order at $39.99 on several marketplaces like Amazon and GameStop. The bundle, called " Honkai: Star Rail Trailblazer Edition," includes the RPG's PS5 game disc and case, a holographic card set with nine characters, two exclusive Trailblazer keychains, an exclusive PS5 postcard, and an in-game Honkai: Star Rail redeem code. The bundle will also be available on January 15 for select Asian regions like Taiwan, Thailand, and Singapore. It is worth noting that potential additional releases in more countries will be announced separately.

Honkai: Star Rail Reveals PS5 Physical Release Date

  • January 31, 2025 (Local time): Canada, United States, United Kingdom, Mexico, Japan, France, Italy, and Spain.
  • January 15, 2025 (Local time): Hong Kong SAR, Macao SAR, and Taiwan Region, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, and Vietnam.

Honkai: Star Rail Trailblazer Edition PS5 Physical Disc Bundle Contents

  • PS5 Physical Game Disc and Case ×1
  • Gilded Holographic Character Card Set ×1 (Including: Firefly, Acheron, Aventurine, Kafka, Blade, Sparkle, Seele, Jingliu, and Robin)
  • Exclusive PS5 Holographic Chibi Trailblazer Keychain ×2
  • Exclusive PS5 Postcard ×1
  • In-game redemption code ×1
    • Stellar Jade ×50, Credit ×30,000, Refined Aether ×3, Honkai: Star Rail Game Disc ×1, Recipe: Honkai: Star Rail Game Disc ×1 (The latter three items are available only through this gift box)

Players wishing to obtain the Honkai: Star Rail PS5 bundle should remember that the reward code can only be used once per account and will become active starting January 15. However, the code isn't exclusive to PS5 consoles, as it can be redeemed on PC and mobile as well. The holographic card set included in the bundle gathers some of Honkai: Star Rail 's most powerful characters, who also happen to be very popular among players. The game will soon add several more units in upcoming updates, so the bonus Stellar Jades could come in handy for fans, too.

After a highly-praised Penacony chapter, there are high expectations for Honkai: Star Rail Version 3.0 and its Amphoreus storyline. The update is expected to launch around mid-January and has confirmed the two new 5-star characters, Aglaea and The Herta. Players can expect that Honkai: Star Rail will share more information about Amphoreus in the upcoming weeks.

item.title: Civilization 7 Reveals Harriet Tubman Abilities
item.description:
Summary

  • Harriet Tubman in Civilization 7 has unique abilities focused on Espionage, War Support, and the removal of movement penalties in Vegetation.
  • Players can choose from many Leaders in Civilization 7, each with specific abilities and attributes.
  • Civilization 7 will launch on February 11, 2025.

Ahead of the release of Sid Meier's Civilization 7 , Firaxis Games has given fans a detailed look at Harriet Tubman, revealing how she plays in the game. While Civilization 7 will not launch until February 11, 2025, this first look at Harriet Tubman’s abilities from the developer could give fans a good idea of whether she is the type of Leader that fits their play style.

One of the major features of Civilization 7 is its Leaders system. Thanks to this feature, players can choose a significant historical figure to help direct their empire in the game. The developer has already detailed many Leaders players will be able to choose from in Civilization 7 , such as Machiavelli, Benjamin Franklin, Charlemagne, and Hatshepsut, and there are more expected to receive the spotlight in the future. Recently, the developer gave players an idea of what to expect from Harriet Tubman, a famous freedom fighter from the United States.

Specifically, Firaxis Games has revealed Harriet Tubman's abilities and attributes, along with sharing a trailer showing some gameplay featuring the character that is coming with the launch of Civilization 7 . According to the developer, the character has a specialty for spying, with her Unique Ability, Combahee Raid, reflecting this. This ability, which references her historic raid that freed hundreds of people, gives Harriet Tubman increased influence when starting Espionage actions. A few other bonuses of this Unique Ability include getting additional War Support when war is declared against the Leader and removing movement penalties in Vegetation.

Harriet Tubman's Abilities in Civilization 7

Unique Ability

Combahee Raid: Increased Influence towards initiating Espionage Actions. Gain a set amount of War Support on all wars declared against her. Units ignore Movement penalties from Vegetated tiles.

Attributes

  • Diplomatic
  • Militaristic

Agendas

Veracity: Increase Relationship by a Medium Amount once for each formal war the player declared. Decrease Relationship by a Medium Amount once for each surprise war the player declared.

Starting Biases

  • Vegetated

Besides the Unique Ability, some other parts of Harriet Tubman’s kit highlighted by Civilization 7 's developer include her Diplomatic and Militaristic attributes, which can be leveled up in the game. In addition, the Leader’s Agenda was revealed to be Veracity, which is related to starting wars. According to the developer, players will receive an increase in Relationship for initiating formal wars, while this value will decrease when starting surprise wars. It is worth pointing out that the character overview also revealed that Harriet Tubman’s map start bias is Vegetated.

It will be interesting to see what else is revealed for Civilization 7 in the weeks leading up to its release on PC and consoles. As part of the festivities at The Game Awards 2024, a cinematic trailer for the game was unveiled, helping to hype up the next installment in the Civilization series. With 26 Leaders reportedly part of the game, it will be interesting to see which others Firaxis Games decides to show off next.
